alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 30 at 3:43AM EDT until September 30 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...In New York, Southeastern St. Lawrence, Southern Franklin and Western Essex Counties. In Vermont, Essex County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Western Essex
